dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT sssu.i_transaction_no, iess.eventdate, sref.shipment_refnum_value booking_no, s.shipment_xid shipment_no, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM/DD/YY') sail_dt, TO_CHAR(s.port_discharge_eta,'MM/DD/YY') eta, loc1.location_name source_loc, loc2.location_name dest_loc, loc3.location_name load_port, loc4.location_name disch_port, ssu.tag_3 container_no, bssc.description status_code, TO_CHAR(iess.eventdate,'MM/DD/YY HH24:MI') || ' ' || iess.time_zone_gid event_dt_tm, NVL(loc5.location_name,iessst.location_name) event_location, iessst.event_city || (CASE WHEN NOT iessst.event_state IS NULL THEN ', ' || iessst.event_state END) event_city_state, NVL(cc1.country_name,cc2.country_name) event_country FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ss_s_ship_unit sssu ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ie_shipmentstatus iess ON sssu.i_transaction_no = iess.i_transaction_no LEFT OUTER JOIN ie_ss_stop iessst ON iess.i_transaction_no = iessst.i_transaction_no LEFT OUTER JOIN bs_status_code bssc ON iess.status_code_gid = bssc.bs_status_code_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON s.port_of_load_location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON s.port_of_dis_location_gid = loc4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc5 ON iessst.location_gid = loc5.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc1 ON loc5.country_code3_gid = cc1.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc2 ON iessst.event_country = cc2.country_code2 WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.servprov_gid = 'SCOULAR.TSCCDO' AND (:SHIPMENT_ID IS NULL OR (NOT :SHIPMENT_ID IS NULL AND s.shipment_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:SHIPMENT_ID, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY INSTR(:SHIPMENT_ID, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0))) AND (:BOOKING IS NULL OR (NOT :BOOKING IS NULL AND sref.shipment_refnum_value IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:BOOKING, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY INSTR(:BOOKING, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0))) AND (:CONTAINERS IS NULL OR (NOT :CONTAINERS IS NULL AND ssu.tag_3 IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CONTAINERS, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY INSTR(:CONTAINERS, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0))) AND (:SAIL_START_DATE IS NULL AND :SAIL_END_DATE IS NULL OR (NOT NVL(:SAIL_START_DATE,:SAIL_END_DATE) IS NULL AND NOT NVL(:SAIL_END_DATE,:SAIL_START_DATE) IS NULL AND (TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(NVL(:SAIL_START_DATE,:SAIL_END_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(NVL(:SAIL_END_DATE,:SAIL_START_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD')))) AND (:ETA_START_DATE IS NULL AND :ETA_END_DATE IS NULL OR (NOT NVL(:ETA_START_DATE,:ETA_END_DATE) IS NULL AND NOT NVL(:ETA_END_DATE,:ETA_START_DATE) IS NULL AND (TO_DATE(s.port_discharge_eta,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(NVL(:ETA_START_DATE,:ETA_END_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.port_discharge_eta,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(NVL(:ETA_END_DATE,:ETA_START_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD')))) AND (:SOURCE IS NULL OR (NOT :SOURCE IS NULL AND loc1.location_gid = :SOURCE)) AND (:DEST IS NULL OR (NOT :DEST IS NULL AND loc2.location_gid = :DEST)) AND (:PORT_LOAD IS NULL OR (NOT :PORT_LOAD IS NULL AND loc3.location_gid = :PORT_LOAD)) AND (:PORT_DISCH IS NULL OR (NOT :PORT_DISCH IS NULL AND loc4.location_gid = :PORT_DISCH)) ORDER BY sref.shipment_refnum_value, s.shipment_xid, ssu.tag_3, iess.eventdate DESC
